title: Lottery time!
body:
Dear riot,
I think it's time to make a lottery so you can get random things like runes,skins and champions cause of buying the champs takes forever when I mean forever 30 games.we could do a ip one and a rp one.so please riot make one we have too many champions and its kinda unfair for people who don't play league much and Beasley has any champs to play.thx

replies.body: Solid idea. Probably belongs in [Player Creations](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations) more than over here.
